Stop by at our cafes

\"}}]},{\"identifier\":\"2f96d7c1-81ab-469a-83de-ac704531b711\",\"type\":\"Kentico.Widget.RichText\",\"variants\":[{\"identifier\":\"4bcedddd-d8b7-431d-ade2-0c39036262a9\",\"properties\":{\"content\":\"

You don’t need to be an aficionado to enjoy the best. Stop by, relax, and put your mind at ease. There are no distractions at Dancing Goat cafes, it’s just you and your cup of coffee. A Dancing Goat cafe is a place where the revival of alternative coffee preparation methods takes place. Extracting the best coffee in a vacuum coffee maker or a charming Chemex is just some of the things you can experience there.

\"}}]}]},{\"identifier\":\"81dd0bba-b780-414e-8a87-21a34845dd9a\",\"widgets\":[{\"identifier\":\"f40d8994-f9f4-4ca0-8530-16f61c895061\",\"type\":\"Kentico.Widget.RichText\",\"variants\":[{\"identifier\":\"3d2b019b-58a9-4b6a-ad91-1ba83f740267\",\"properties\":{\"content\":\"

Company history

\"}}]},{\"identifier\":\"67afb2e4-7810-4d2a-acdb-57009671f9a5\",\"type\":\"Kentico.Widget.RichText\",\"variants\":[{\"identifier\":\"4d8e4948-58c1-4409-9a29-a8fc83008298\",\"properties\":{\"content\":\"

Dancing Goat originated in 1969 as a company of coffee enthusiasts. Our main focus has always been on offering the best you can taste. Knowing our farmers personally and having quality as a top requirement, we have become a well-known brand, available worldwide.

\"}}]}]}]}]},{\"identifier\":\"area3\",\"sections\":[{\"identifier\":\"0fdbad64-0e8c-4ea2-95a0-4fd1bcd42d48\",\"type\":\"DancingGoat.ThreeColumnSection\",\"properties\":{\"title\":null,\"theme\":null},\"zones\":[{\"identifier\":\"332b6cf8-9313-4542-8404-f5e2b2cdc10f\",\"widgets\":[]},{\"identifier\":\"24f26ca2-e33a-4165-8d4c-5901a3db5a19\",\"widgets\":[]},{\"identifier\":\"da9d8a6c-efb1-48e2-a75d-4a3352361e72\",\"widgets\":[]}]}]}]}","pageTemplate":""}]}
